https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/z03U4V07y3teOxWYUyVzo3VoWRY.jpg Mariana, a thirty-year-old woman, is hidden in a coats room, during a Christmas party. A distant cousin discovers her and they establish a relationship where some painful truths about life and their family history come to surface for the first time. Addictions for a Happy Family
